pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 4, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, August 4, 2017:

St-Albert, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the St-Albert Cheese Factory.

St-Albert Cheese Factory
150 St-Paul Street

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:30 p.m.

Maxville, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 70th Annual Glengarry Highland Games.

34 Fair Street
Maxville, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity
